process.name: HR process - end of contract
process.documentation:
HR process - end of contract The process starts for every identity contract, which is newly not valid at the moment (meaning it was valid in the last run of the task, but now it's not). If the processed contract was the last valid contract of the identity, the identity is disabled.
Additionally all added roles, which were assigned to the ended contract, are removed by the process.
Input: dto - IdmIdentityContractDto
